sources.label: Color Code Converter (HEX, RGB, HSL, CMYK) Convert between HEX, RGB, HSL and CMYK with copy-ready outputs.
Typography Unit Converter (px, pt, em, rem, %) Translate px, pt, em, rem and % for consistent, responsive type.
Data Storage Converter Convert bits, bytes, KB, MB, GB, TB and PB (SI/IEC).
Data Transfer Rate Converter Convert Mbps, MB/s, Gbps and more for throughput and file-time math.
IP Address Subnet Calculator Compute CIDR, masks and host ranges (IPv4/IPv6).
URL Encoder/Decoder Percent-encode/decode safely for web and APIs.
HTML Entity Encoder/Decoder Escape and unescape HTML entities for clean markup.
